channel.title: [PI] Opening the Wizard Guilds Doors in Yanille
channel.description: I've tried adding them to doors.cfg but I can't get them to open. How would I make it so they opened like normal doors?

item.title: [PI] Opening the Wizard Guilds Doors in Yanille
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

Of course, people have a similiar problem with these specific doors. But I can’t find a thread or a fix anywhere

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Opening the Wizard Guilds Doors in Yanille

item.title: [PI] Opening the Wizard Guilds Doors in Yanille
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

Have you checked to make sure you’re using the right coordinates and door id?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Opening the Wizard Guilds Doors in Yanille

item.title: [PI] Opening the Wizard Guilds Doors in Yanille
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:6, topic:526209”]you could technically cheaphax it, using teleports but that’s lame.

try these links
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/321822-pi-goodbye-doors-cfg.html
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/361957-single-doors.html
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/362808-doubledoors.html[/quote]
I did the single doors tutorial and all my single doors work now, but wasn’t having a problem with them before, but still. And then I did the double doors one and that worked too, but still my wizard guild ones do not open.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Opening the Wizard Guilds Doors in Yanille

item.title: [PI] Opening the Wizard Guilds Doors in Yanille
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

I have all the Door Info correctly put, just with big doors they don’t seem to work. And I can’t cheaphax it because I need them to be able to open it from the inside also so they can go outside. So I can’t just make them teleport.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Opening the Wizard Guilds Doors in Yanille

item.title: [PI] Opening the Wizard Guilds Doors in Yanille
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“Not Botting, post:3, topic:526209”][quote author=Vhenom link=topic=644954.msg4338809#msg4338809 date=1374801901]
I’ve tried adding them to doors.cfg but I can’t get them to open. How would I make it so they opened like normal doors?
[/quote]

Why not just make life easy on yourself and forget all that door handling bullshit and make the door teleport you to the other side when clicked?[/quote]why cheaphax when you can just make things work the way they should

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Opening the Wizard Guilds Doors in Yanille

item.title: [PI] Opening the Wizard Guilds Doors in Yanille
item.dc:creator: @Not_Botting Not Botting
item.description:
@Not_Botting wrote:

Vhenom:

I’ve tried adding them to doors.cfg but I can’t get them to open. How would I make it so they opened like normal doors?

Why not just make life easy on yourself and forget all that door handling bullshit and make the door teleport you to the other side when clicked?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Opening the Wizard Guilds Doors in Yanille

does your server have proper handling for double doors, or just single?
